name: You'll get hit by a bulldozer on the way to work and die at 42.
You'll be killed by a teenager on a cocaine-fueled rampage when you're 60.
Your middle life crisis results in a heroin-fueled orgy in which you get HIV. You die a slow, agonizing death, after your entire family leaves you at 55.
A way to transfer your conscience into a robot is found, you die when a software update goes wrong at 453.
Your life is as average as your intellect and charisma. You die at 70, probably of boredom.
You'll die by choking on gum at 30, you idiot.
You'll die from a heart attack at 62.
A meteor falls on your house and you die at 32. Your daughter watches in horror from the backyard. Oops.
You die after an airline pilot decides to fly by his girlfriend's house and crashes. You die at 26
You're in a car crash after sneezing so hard you veer right suddenly. You kill your mom who was lovingly waiting for you. You wake up in hell at 42.
